synopsis: Having moved recently, Ooki Futaba still hasn't gotten over her old life. That's when she has an encounter with the ocean and a peppy girl.
As Hikari sets off for another fun-filled school day, Futaba wakes up feeling an unexpected sensation in her heart.

title.jp: Wakuwaku to Shiawase no Kotsu no Koto

synopsis: Hikari tries to alleviate Futaba's apprehensions about her new life in a way that she knows best. Futaba later has to "study" as her trial period in the Diving Club begins.

title.jp: Wakuwaku to Akirameru Kokoro no Koto

synopsis: Futaba observes an ocean diving exercise to prepare for her pool training and gets more motivated. Unfortunately, she runs into trouble in the pool...

title.jp: Nakama to Hajimete no Umi no Koto

synopsis: Hikari and Futaba finally meet their seniors in the Diving Club, but the meeting doesn't exactly go as planned...

title.jp: Honto ja Nai Negai no Koto

synopsis: While taking a pool course to prepare for the Open Water Diver certification, Futaba reveals a rather unexpected fact.

title.jp: Ame no Owari no Koto / Natsu no Hajimari no Koto

synopsis: The changing of the seasons affects the mood of everyone in the Diving Club, especially Katori Mato. However, she ends up finding ways to enjoy the moment with a little help from her friends.

title.jp: Himeta Omoi no Koto / Madamada Shiranai Koto

synopsis: Ai and Teko are revisited from Makoto's and Pikari's perspectives respectively and reveal a surprising side to their personality.
Futaba's phone memory maxes out, reminding her that her memorable photos are nothing but data.

title.jp: Kyou to Iu Ichinichi wo Mayou Koto

synopsis: Hikari and Futaba lend Ai a helping hand when she's lost trying to figure out how to spend the day.
Futaba and Hikari take a walk down a path neither of them know, and end up finding a tiny kitten all on its own.
It's finally time for Futaba's open water course as she sets off for a whole new world she's never seen before and reflects on her journey there.
